item.title: Denmark slashes 2025 growth forecast amid Novo Nordisk slowdown
item.description: Denmark on Friday cut its annual growth forecast to 1.4% from 3%.

item.title: U.S. economy expanded 3.3% in Q2, with growth even stronger than initially thought
item.description: Consumer spending, which rose by 1.6% compared with an initial 1.4% estimate, helped push the number higher.

item.title: Trump's Fed firing: What to know and why it matters
item.description: What you need to know about President Donald Trump's decision to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.

item.title: German autos sector slashes jobs as economic woes bite
item.description: Germany's industry is suffering as Europe's largest economy is facing various headwinds.

item.title: Spain’s economy keeps growing — why is the country doing so well?
item.description: A booming tourism sector, foreign investment and immigration are among the main pillars supporting economic growth in Spain.
